K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-5: gal te theg pa tha dad pa rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-6: 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-7: 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-8: 'di ni theg pa chen po'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la theg pa gsum bstan pa de ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-11: theg pa tha dad pa zhes bya ba de ni sa rnam par gzhag pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-13: rab 'bring tha ma'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag par bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-14: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag rnam par gzhag par bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-15: tshogs chung du bsags pa'i sems can rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-16: bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir theg pa tha dad par bzhag gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-17: theg pa ni tha dad du dbyer med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-19: chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:306b-21: theg pa bstan pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas sgrib pa med par gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307a-1: na; 'phong gi slob dpon mkhas pa 'phong shes pa'i mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307a-3: spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307a-5: spyod lam sna tshogs ston cing slob ma la 'phong slob kyang 'phong shes pa de gcig yin pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'phong gi slob dpon mkhas pa'ang chos kyi tshul sna tshogs la 'jug pas khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307a-9: mos pa tha dad par sems can rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gcig las theg pa gsum du ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307a-13: me stag chung ngu yar ba'ang rtsva'i rgyu dang ldan zhing mched na sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me lta bur tshig par nus par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307a-15: de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba'i ma stag gcig po de'ang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyir mthar gyis mched cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i snang ba'i bar du byed nus par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307a-19: ri dvags phra mo thams cad ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi mdun na 'dug par nus pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307a-21: de bzhin du gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-0: @307b 'tsho ba can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun na 'dug par ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-1: tshig smra bar nus pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-3: mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa'i skyes bu chen po'i seng ge'i mdun na sgra sgrog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-4: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa ni ma gtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-8: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar pa 'od zer gyi dra ba brgya stong grangs med pa rab tu 'gyed pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-9: srin bu me khyer thams cad 'od med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-14: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i ye shes chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-15: ye shes chen po'i 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa rab tu bkye bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-16: gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-18: gcer bu pa la sogs pa thams cad 'od med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-21: mdzes pa ma yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs su shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i yul de ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:307b-23: des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-3: gzhan mu stegs can gyi sgo de dag thams cad ni rnam par thar pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-4: ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-6: thabs mkhas pa chen pos rnam par rtsen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-9: dge 'dun yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-10: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i mchog gi pha rol tu son pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-11: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-15: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can de dag sems can re re nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-16: dzambu'i gling la dbang ba'i rgyal por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-17: de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis theg pa chen po gang len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-20: kun chub par byed pa de sha las nyi ma re re zhing yang srang lnga lnga sen mos gcad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-21: de tshul de lta bus srog dang dbral lo zhes smra ba la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-23: gal te byang chub sems dpa' de skad smra bas mi skrag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308a-26: tha na skrag pa'i sems kyang mi skyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-0: gong ba @308b med; the tshom med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-1: phyir zhing chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-3: kha ton byed pa la brtson par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-12: ting nge 'dzin la dpa' ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-14: gal te byang chub sems dpa' de gsod pa'i mi de dag la mi khro zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-16: zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-18: byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-24: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa gso ba la mos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-25: phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-29: sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-30: sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-33: tha ba sel ba'i phyir zhugs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:308b-35: gang gis gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams las sangs rgyas re re la'ang gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos rab tu bkang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-2: de ltar dbul bas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal bar dbul ba phul ba bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-4: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang gis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-6: 'di ltar sems kyis mngon par rtog cing 'di lta bu'i chos la bslab par bya'o zhes slob par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-7: des ma bslabs su zin kyang bsod nams ches mang du skyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-8: byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po sbyin pa'i bsod nams ni de lta ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-10: de'i sems bskyed ma thag pa des chos bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-12: byams pa yongs su bzung ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-14: ma 'ongs pa dang; da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' dang mi 'gal bar byas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-15: de nan tan snying por byed pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-16: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-17: chos bzhi po de dag yongs su 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-18: gzhan yang chos bzhi yongs su 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309a-22: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-0: sgrib pa med pa'i blo'i rnam par thar pa yongs su 'dzin pa ste bzhi @309b po de dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-2: chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-5: g-yo med cing sgyu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-6: lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang mi 'brel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-7: sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la'ang shin tu gus pa ste chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-10: gal te byang chub sems dpa' la rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-11: blon po chen po gang zhig 'di skad ces gal te khyod sems can gcig gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig yang dag par bsgrubs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-12: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la zan chang gcig tsam sbyin zhing bsgrub na'ang de'i phyir ngas khyod kyi sha sen mos btogs te med par bya'o zhes zer la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-13: gal te byang chub sems dpa' de skad zer ba la mi skrag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-15: dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing 'jigs pa med kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:309b-17: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus kyi sha sen mos bcad de bor yang bdag spro bar bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-0: bdag sems can gcig gi phyir yang ji tsam du chung ngu na'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig yang dag par mi bsgrub tu mi gtang ngo snyam nas sems bskyed pa gcig po des byang chub sems dpa' des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed @310a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-1: kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin zil gyis gnon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-2: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang zil gyis gnon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-4: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-5: de bzhin du gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-6: tshangs pa 'thob cing myong bar 'gyur ro; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-8: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can rnams la snying rje bskyed na de snying rje dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos bzhi yongs su 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-10: brtan pa'i sems yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-11: khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-12: snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-13: phyin ci log gi shes pa spangs nas phyin ci ma log pa'i ye shes 'thob pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-14: gzhan yang chos bzhi yongs su 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-16: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa mchog yongs su 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310a-17: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa mchog de dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' lha gzhan la rton par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-0: dran pa phun @310b sum tshogs pa mchog 'thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-1: dran pa phun sum tshogs pa mchog de dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' skye bar skye na tsho rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-2: dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa mchog yongs su 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa mchog de dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-4: sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-5: gal te sangs rgyas ni ma byung la dzambu'i gling du skyes na'ang skyes bu dam par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-6: dzambu'i gling na sbyin pa'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-8: gzhan mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-9: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba de dag mgu bar byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-10: de dag mgu bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-12: lha rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-13: nam bag med par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bskul bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-14: bskul nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-15: de'i dran pa chud mi za bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:310b-16: byang chub yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyur brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-1: sems bskyed pa des rnam par dag par byed pa'i chos lnga yongs su 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-3: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-4: lus rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-5: mtshan phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-10: byang chub sems dpa' la brten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-11: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la brten pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-13: rnam par dag par byed pa'i chos de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-16: rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dzambu gling ba'i sems can thams cad kyi srog bcad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-17: de dag gi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-20: rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gi sems bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-21: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la tha na zan chang gcig byin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-22: de de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311a-24: sangs rgyas 'byung ba skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-0: rigs kyi bu'am rigs @311b kyi bu mo gang la la mdo sde dkon mchog sangs rgyas kyi ye shes skyed pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la smod cing bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-1: 'dum par mi byed; dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba la mos pa dang bral bar byad cing bar chad byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-3: de mi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-4: de der skyes nas lus dpag tshad lnga brgya pa 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-5: lus de la'ang mgo lnga brgyar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-6: mgo bo re re la'ang lce lnga rgya lnga brgyar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-7: lce re re la'ang thong shol lnga brgya lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-8: bskal pa ji snyed cig gis byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de snyed kyi bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skyes nas sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-10: de sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i bar chad bya bar zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-11: gang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa de sangs rgyas kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-12: chos kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-13: dge 'dun gyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-14: de lha'i rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:311b-15: de tshangs pa thams cad kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:312a-1: rten gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:312a-2: de sems can thams cad kyi bde bar sbyar ba thams cad gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:332b-5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:332b-6: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:332b-9: padma dkar po rnams kyi char chen po'ang rab tu bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:332b-10: tsandan sprul gyi snying po'i spos kyi char chen po'ang mngon par rab tu bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:332b-13: rgyan gyi char chen po'ang rab tu bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:332b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:332b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lag pa mngon par sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:332b-16: lag pa re res kyang lha'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-1: du med pa'i gdugs kyi sprin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-5: tsandan sbrul gyi snying po'i sprin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-6: rgyan gyi sprin dang; seng ge'i rgyal mtshan zla ba'i sprin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-7: nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad bsags pa'i sprin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-8: nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-9: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la'ang gtor cing mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-12: bde bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-13: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten du yun ring du gnas par gyur cig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-15: lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-17: brjod du med pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog manda ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-18: manda ra ba chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333a-26: dha nu ska ri de ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-0: 'khor lo chen po la sogs @333b [?] lha'i me tog gi char chen po rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-4: ba dan gyi char rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-5: lha'i tsanda na sprul gyi snying po'i char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-6: rin po che sprin gyi char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-7: rgyan gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-10: 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa grangs med pas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dzambu'i gling gi tshad tsam gyi me tog gi sprin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-12: rin po che'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-19: lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-21: tshad med pa dag gis kyang lha'i me tog gi char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-24: rin po che'i char mngon par phab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-25: lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa byas nas tshig 'di skad ces /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-28: bde bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-30: bdag cag gis sngon ma thos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:333b-32: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:334a-1: 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:334a-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:334a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:334a-4: bzang skyong la sogs pa dge bsnyen stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:334a-5: nyan thos chen po dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:334a-13: lto 'phye chen po brgya phrag grangs med pa dag yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:334a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:334a-15: 'phags pa rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:334a-16: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:334a-18: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-003:334a-19: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
